oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic Farming in Germany / Organic Farming in Switzerland
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Willer, Helga
Yussefi, Minou
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Switzerland
Germany
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
The two papers give a brief overview of the current (2006) organic farming sitation in Germany and in Switzerland.
The papers include information about the history of organic farming, the market situation and statistics.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Willer, Helga and Yussefi, Minou (2006) Organic Farming in Germany / Organic Farming in Switzerland. Middle East Food (MEF) Magazine, 22 (3), pp. 44-46.
